about_the_game:
The Postmouse soundtrack features 28 minutes of original music composed for the game by composer and sound designer Carl Lindegaard
Enter the world of Postmouse, from the gorgeous Yellow Woods to the creepy cellars below the mansion, brought to life by a full orchestra with guest performances from cellist Oskar Lemke and violinist Sille Nielsen.
